name: Space for rent
description:
Rent out your space!

In this game, you only have one space and you need to plan carefully what to set up before each event. 

Each event has its special requirements for time of the day and setup. If you didn't put it in the requested time, you will lose some of the rental payment. If you didn't fulfil the setup request, you will get a lower rating.

Do you think you can plan well?

How To Play:

  • Drag item () from Setup to the available setup section () on Planner
  • Drag the square event icon () to the available event section () on Planner
  • You can start the day once you have at least 1 event planned
  • You can prep the setup from the late night () of the day before  to the evening () of the day  itself

--

Note:

This is the first game I developed by myself. I didn't have enough time to put sfx, finish all the character animation and the ending screen. It should end when day 3 ends. Hope you still enjoy it!
